data.title: The Oriental Museum
data.text:
From Ancient Egypt to modern China, we are the only museum in the North of England devoted entirely to the art and archaeology of the great cultures of Northern Africa and Asia.

We have frequently changing exhibitions and a well-stocked gift shop and cafe.

We are committed to being as accessible as possible for all visitors. A summary of our facilities is set out on our ‘Access’ page, where you can view a full access statement, visual stories and a map of the museum

We are open weekdays 10.00am - 5.00pm and weekends and Bank Holidays 12.00 noon - 5.00pm. Please note we are closed on Mondays.

Mah Jong Club - Second Sunday of each month with Friends of Museum.

Telephone 0191 334 5694 for information or follow us on Twitter .

All age groups welcome from birth onwards.
